original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarassa pūgassa āvasathapiṇḍo paññatto hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyāḥ avidūre aññatarassa pūgassa āvasatha piṇḍo paññattaḥ hoti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā piṇḍaṁ alabhamānā āvasathaṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pavisitvā piṇḍam a labhamānāḥ āvasatham agamasu

original: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dutiyampi divasaṁ …pe… tatiyampi divasaṁ pubbaṇhasamayaṁ
analyzed: atha kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū dutiyam pi divasam pe tatiyam pi divasam pubbaṇhasamaya

original: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā piṇḍaṁ alabhamānā āvasathaṁ gantvā bhuñjiṁsu.
analyzed: nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pavisitvā piṇḍam a labhamānāḥ āvasatham gantvā bhuñjisu
atha kho chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi
hiyyas pi idha iva āgantabbam bhavissati iti
tatthā iva anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjanti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjissanti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: ekaḥ āvasatha piṇḍaḥ bhuñjitabbo tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchanto yena aññataro āvasatho tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto kosalesu janapade sāvatthim gacchantaḥ yena aññataraḥ āvasathaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa bhuttāvissa kharo ābādho uppajji, nāsakkhi tamhā āvasathā pakkamituṁ.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa bhuttāvissa kharaḥ ābādhaḥ uppajji na asakkhi tamhā āvasathā pakkamitu

original: Atha kho te manussā dutiyampi divasaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te manussāḥ dutiyam pi divasam āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avocu

original: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi;
analyzed: bhagavatā paṭikkhittam anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjitunti kukkuccāyantaḥ na paṭiggahesi

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ sāvatthim gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānena bhikkhunā anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Agilānena bhikkhunā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: a gilānena bhikkhunā ekaḥ āvasatha piṇḍaḥ bhuñjitabbo tatas ce uttari bhuñjeyya pācittiyanti

original: pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññataraṁ bhojanaṁ— sālāya vā maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā ajjhokāse vā anodissa yāvadattho paññatto hoti.
analyzed: pañcannam bhojanānam aññataram bhojana sālāya vā maṇḍape vā rukkha mūle vā ajjhokāse vā an udissa yāvadatthaḥ paññattaḥ hoti

original: Agilānena bhikkhunā sakiṁ bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari “bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: a gilānena bhikkhunā sakim bhuñjitabbaḥ tatas ce uttari bhuñjissāmi iti paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Agilāno agilānasaññī tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ a gilāna saññī tat uttari āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilāno vematiko tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ vematiko tatuttari āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilāno gilānasaññī tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ gilāna saññī tat uttari āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
gilānaḥ a gilāna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
